oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
Military Academy members sitting on porch of Guest House
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Three men standing and two men sitting on a porch
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Guest House; Hotels; Military uniforms; Soldiers; United States. Army. Dept. of West Point
Bartlett, Boyd W.; Counts, Gerald A.; Taylor, Maxwell D. (Maxwell Davenport), 1901-1987; Viney, Alvin G.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: See Oak Ridge Journal article on October 3, 1946. "The group below, photographed on the Guest house porch, are from the Military Academy. Left to right they are Colonel Thomas D. Stamps, professor of Military Art and Engineering; General Taylor, Superintendent; Colonel Boyd W. Bartlett, professor of Electricity; Colonel Gerald A. Counts, Professor of physics and Colonel Alvin G. Viney, G-4 on General Taylor's staff.
3068-2; 9-30-1946; Col. Thomas D. Stamps; Maj Gen Maxwell Taylor; Col Boyd W. Bartlett; Col. Gerald A. Counts; Col Alvin G. Viney
